languages.text: "Никто не заставлял тебя, Каллигос. Я лишь потакал твоей жажде, подпитывал ее — и гнев твой расцвел прекрасным алым цветом! Ты и сам обо всем догадывался, но гордыня не позволила тебе признать свои слабости". {n}Голос Серого Вортена искажается с каждым словом, и на краю сознания возникает мысль — вы желаете убить его. Растерзать. Прямо сейчас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Никто не заставлял тебя, Каллигос. Я лишь потакал твоей жажде, подпитывал ее — и гнев твой расцвел прекрасным алым цветом! Ты и сам обо всем догадывался, но гордыня не позволила тебе признать свои слабости". {n}Голос Серого Вортена искажается с каждым словом, и на краю сознания возникает мысль — вы желаете убить его. Растерзать. Прямо сейчас!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}
languages.original_text: "Никто не заставлял тебя, Каллигос. Я лишь потакал твоей жажде, подпитывал ее — и гнев твой расцвел прекрасным алым цветом! Ты и сам обо всем догадывался, но гордыня не позволила тебе признать свои слабости". {n}Голос Серого Вортена искажается с каждым словом, и на краю сознания возникает мысль — вы желаете убить его. Растерзать. Прямо сейчас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nobody forced you, Calligos. I merely indulged your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! Even your suspicions could not outweigh your pride and admit your weaknesses/" {n}Worten the Grey's speech distorts with each word, and a thought arises at the back of your mind — you wish to kill him, Tear him apart. Right her and now!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

traits.locale_text: "Nobody forced you, Calligos. I merely indulged your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! Right her and now!{/n}

Even your suspicions could not outweigh your pride and admit your weaknesses/" {n}Worten the Grey's speech distorts with each word, and a thought arises at the back of your mind — you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Right here and now!{/n}

Even your suspicions could not outweigh your pride and admit your weaknesses/" {n}Worten the Grey's speech distorts with each word, and a thought arises at the back of your mind — you wish to kill him, tear him apart. traits.locale_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

traits.locale_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: «Nadie te ha obligado, Calligos. ¡Yo me he limitado a avivar tu anhelo, a fomentarlo y hacer que aflorase tu rabia carmesí! Tenías tus dudas, ¡pero tu orgullo te impidió admitir tus debilidades!». {n}La voz de Worten se distorsiona con cada palabra que pronuncia, y una idea se forma en el fondo de tu mente: quieres matarlo, deseas hacerlo pedazos. ¡Aquí y ahora!{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nadie te ha obligado, Calligos. ¡Yo me he limitado a satisfacer tu anhelo, a fomentarlo y hacer que aflorase tu rabia carmesí! ¡Ni con todo tu recelo fuiste capaz de sobreponerte al orgullo y admitir tus debilidades!». {n}La voz de Worten el Gris se distorsiona con cada palabra que pronuncia, y una idea se forma en el fondo de tu mente: quieres matarlo, deseas hacerlo pedazos. ¡Aquí y ahora!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: “没人强迫你，卡里戈斯。我只不过是纵容你，助长你的欲望，让你怒火中烧！你曾怀疑过这一切，但出于傲慢，你不肯承认你的弱点。”{n}沃尔腾每说出一个字，言语就扭曲一分。这样的念头在你的脑海中不断膨胀——你想杀了他，把他撕成碎片。就在这里！就是现在！{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没人强迫你，卡里戈斯。我只不过是纵容你，助长你的欲望，让你怒火中烧！即便是你心中的怀疑，也无法战胜你的傲慢。你不愿承认你的弱点。”{n}灰斑沃尔腾每说出一个字，言语就扭曲一分。你的脑海中浮现出了这样的念头——你想杀了他，把他撕成碎片。就在这里！就是现在！{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: « Personne ne vous a forcé la main, Calligos. Je me suis contenté d'assouvir votre désir, de l'encourager... et de faire éclore toute votre colère ! Vous aviez des soupçons, mais votre fierté vous empêchait d'admettre votre faiblesse. » {n}En entendant la voix de Worten le Gris, qui s'altère à chaque mot, une pensée se forme dans votre esprit : vous voulez le tuer, le mettre en pièces... sur-le-champ !{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Personne ne vous a forcé la main, Calligos. Je me suis contenté d'assouvir votre désir, de l'encourager... et de faire éclore toute votre colère ! Vous aviez des soupçons, mais votre fierté vous empêchait d'admettre votre faiblesse. » {n}En entendant la voix de Worten le Gris, qui s'altère à chaque mot, une pensée se forme dans votre esprit : vous voulez le tuer, le mettre en pièces... sur-le-champ !{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: 「誰も強制などしていないぞ、カリゴス。俺はただお前の欲望を甘やかし、育てただけだ…そしてお前の深紅の怒りを花開かせた！お前は疑ってはいたが、お前のプライドが、己の弱さを認めることを良しとしなかったのだ！」{n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの口調が言葉を重ねるごとに歪む。そしてある思考があなたの心に芽生えてくる…彼をここで殺し、引き裂きたいと。そう、今すぐに！{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誰も強制などしていないぞ、カリゴス。俺はただお前の欲望を甘やかし、育てただけだ…そしてお前の深紅の怒りを花開かせた！お前は疑ってはいたが、お前のプライドが、己の弱さを認めることを良しとしなかったのだ！」{n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの口調が言葉を重ねるごとに歪む。そしてある思考があなたの心に芽生えてくる…彼をここで殺し、引き裂きたいと。そう、今すぐに！{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "Niemand hat Euch gezwungen, Calligos. Ich habe lediglich Eure Begierden geweckt, habe sie genährt ... und Eure rote Wut erblühen lassen! Ihr habt es geahnt, aber Euer eigener Stolz hat verhindert, dass Ihr Eure Schwächen erkennt." {n}Die Stimme von Worten dem Grauen wird mit jedem Wort stärker verzerrt, während sich am Rand deines Bewusstseins ein Gedanke manifestiert ... du willst ihn töten und in Stücke reißen. Hier und jetzt!{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Niemand hat Euch gezwungen, Calligos. Ich habe lediglich Euren Begierden Raum gegeben, sie genährt — und Eure rote Wut erblühen lassen! Selbst Euer Misstrauen konnte Euren Stolz nicht überwiegen und Eure Schwächen nicht eingestehen." {n}Die Stimme von Worten dem Grauen verzerrt sich mit jedem Wort stärker, und ein Gedanke steigt am Rand deines Bewusstseins auf — du willst ihn töten, ihn zerreißen. Hier und jetzt!{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Archmilitant

languages.text: "Seni kimse bir şeye zorlamadı Calligos. Ben yalnızca arzularına imkân tanıdım. Onları büyüttüm ve kızıl öfkenin açığa çıkmasını sağladım! Şüphelensen de gururun, kendi zayıflığını fark etmekten seni alıkoydu." {n}Worten'ın konuşması, ettiği her kelimeyle daha da çarpık bir hâl alıyor. Zihninin gerisinde bir düşünce belirmeye başlıyor: Onu öldürmek, paramparça etmek istiyorsun. Hem de şimdi, burada...{/n}
languages.original_text: "No one forced you, Calligos. I merely enabled your desire, fostered it — and made your crimson rage blossom! You suspected, yet your own pride stopped you from recognising your weaknesses." {n}Worten's speech becomes more and more distorted with each word, and a thought swells in the back of your mind: you wish to kill him, tear him apart. Here, now!{/n}
